trans-unit.source: Presents the packet information from a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta as informações de pacote de uma chamada para <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> ou <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações de origem do pacote recebido como resultado de chamar o método <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> ou o método <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that indicates the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> que indica as informações de origem do pacote recebido como resultado da chamada de <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> método ou <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: For packets that were sent from a unicast address, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> property will return the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the sender; for multicast or broadcast packets, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> property will return the multicast or broadcast <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />.
trans-unit.target: Para os pacotes que foram enviados de um endereço de unicast, o <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> propriedade retornará o <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> do remetente; para pacotes de difusão ou multicast, o <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> propriedade retornará o multicast ou difusão <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com essa instância.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se essa instância é igual a um objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="comparand" /> is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> and equals the value of the instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="comparand" /> é uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> e é igual ao valor da instância; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: An Int32 hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash Int32.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is constructed from the values of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O código hash é construído com os valores de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the network interface information that is associated with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações do adaptador de rede que estão associadas uma chamada para <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> ou <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value, which represents the index of the network interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> valor, que representa o índice da interface de rede.

trans-unit.source: You can use this index with <see cref="M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces" /> to get more information about the relevant interface.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse índice com <see cref="M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces" /> para obter mais informações sobre a interface relevante.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> que está à esquerda do operador de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> que está à direita do operador de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> especificadas são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> and <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> e <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: Este operador testa ambos o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> valores para os dois argumentos.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> que está à esquerda do operador de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> que está à direita do operador de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> especificadas não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> and <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> are unequal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> e <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> forem diferentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: Este operador testa ambos o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> valores para os dois argumentos.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
